CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 11, 1954, pg. 24 reads: "LL Champs - Shown are the Pittsburgh Lions, 1954 champions of the Uptown Little League. Pictured are Robert McLaughlin, Barry Terry, Robert Sneed, Levi Williams, LaVatre Hill, John Wilkins, Richard Reed, Manager W. Bradshaw, Coach Don Messago and President Charles Betts.  Not shown are John Lovor, Chum McCleary, Kenny Williams, Pee Wee Coleman, John Mitchell, Don Craven and Tom Harper. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of the Pittsburgh Lions Little League baseball team, front row, left to right; Robert McLaughlin, Barry Terry, Robert Sneed, Levi Williams, LaVatre Hill, John Wilkins, Richard Reed, back row; Manager W. Bradshaw, Coach Don Messago and President Charles Betts
